name: DocBook XSL Configurator
short_description: DocBook XSL Configurator is an umbrella project containing three Java (Swing) applications used to create DocBook XSL customization layers (FO, HTML, and Manpages) and then execute external subprocesses to transform DocBook XML and view the output.
